{{{class="brush: ruby"
  //scroll to the first field_with_errors field
  if ($(".field_with_errors").first().length) {
    $ele = $(".field_with_errors").first();
    $("html, body").animate({ scrollTop: $ele.offset().top }, 1000);
  }
}}}
